mapper.update: create view `friendsView_${id}` as select * from friends where (uid = #{id} or target = #{id})

create view `friendsStatus_${id}` as select (users.id, users.name, users.mail, users.level, users.`status`, users.registry) from friends, users where (uid = #{id} and target = users.id and friends.status = true)
grant select, show view on `friendsView_${id}` to `${name}`
grant select, show view on `friendsStatus_${id}` to `${name}`
mapper.delete: delete from friends where uid = #{uid} and target = #{target}
